Class FastTrack.Builder

public static class FastTrack.Builder extends Object
Builder to build a FastTrack instance.

  • Method Details

    • build

      public FastTrack build()
      Build FastTrack singleton instance. Note:
      • FastTrack.configureSecureLog(SecureLogConfig) has to be called first before calling this API.
      • Make sure to call it once only as the second call will throw RuntimeException
      • This API will do some internal initialise so it might take some time; thus it should be called outside of the main thread.
      Returns:
      the instance
      See Also:
      • FastTrack.configureSecureLog(SecureLogConfig)

    • withActivationCode

      public FastTrack.Builder withActivationCode(@NonNull String activationCode)
      Build FastTrack with activation code.
      Parameters:
      activationCode - The activation code. This value is use to unlock Secure Messenger, VIC Token or Secure PinPad feature. This value could be retrieved from Gemalto representative. The value is in Hex string format.
      Returns:
      the builder.

    • withDeviceBinding

      public FastTrack.Builder withDeviceBinding(boolean deviceBinding)
      Build FastTrack with device binding. If this value is set, the token will tied with the device where the application installed.
      Parameters:
      deviceBinding - Set activation code. Default policy is DefaultSettings.DEVICE_BINDING.
      Returns:
      the builder.

    • withPassword

      public FastTrack.Builder withPassword(@NonNull String password)
      Build FastTrack with password.
      Parameters:
      password - A custom password to set. This password is used to protect Mobile Protector, Secure Messenger or Secure Storage data.
      Returns:
      the builder

    • withMspObfuscationKeys

      public FastTrack.Builder withMspObfuscationKeys(List<byte[]> mspObfuscationKeys)
      Build FastTrack with msp obfuscation keys.
      Parameters:
      mspObfuscationKeys - the msp obfuscation keys
      Returns:
      the builder

    • withMspVerificationKeys

      public FastTrack.Builder withMspVerificationKeys(List<TransactionSignatureKey> mspSignatureKeys)
      Build FastTrack with msp verification keys.
      Parameters:
      mspSignatureKeys - the msp signature keys
      Returns:
      the builder
